H0.text: Which song was a hit for both Guns ‘n’ Roses in 1988 and Sheryl Crow in 1999. November Rain

H1.text: Which song was a hit for both Guns ‘n’ Roses in 1988 and Sheryl Crow in 1999. Patience

H2.text: Which song was a hit for both Guns ‘n’ Roses in 1988 and Sheryl Crow in 1999. Welcome to the Jungle

H3.text: Which song was a hit for both Guns ‘n’ Roses in 1988 and Sheryl Crow in 1999. Sweet Child O'Mine

A4.text: Crow's cover of the Guns N' Roses song 'Sweet Child o' Mine' was included on the soundtrack of the film Big Daddy.

A5.text: The song won a Grammy for Best Female Rock Vocal Performance at the 42nd Annual Grammy Awards in 2000.
